skills.name: Nightmarish Beak
skills.description: [SP: 4][CD: 7s] Use chain claws to grapple the target towards the wielder or send the wielder to the target and perform scythe slashes dealing 100% + 800.0% ATK of Ice DMG. Starchasm Nyx equip bonus: Scythe slashes restore 1 Carmine Gash and can be connected into Sequence 4 of Basic ATK.

skills.name: Crimson Eyes
skills.description: Ice DMG increases by 25.0%. Ultimate and Burst mode attacks deal 30.0% bonus Total DMG.
